title: Alex Jones Show - 2014 Mar 28 FR [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show 
Friday, 28 March 2014


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................
From the Infowars web site :: On this Friday, March 28 edition of The Alex Jones Show, guest host David Knight covers the latest news, including developments in Ukraine as the country's Parliament rejects the bankster IMF deal designed to impose suffocating austerity on the people and strip the nation of its wealth. 

David also covers remarks by the Supreme Court on the Obamacare and Hobby Lobby case dealing with religious freedom. 

On today's broadcast, David talks with PrisonPlanet.com editor and writer Paul Joseph Watson about Turkey's planned false flag attack to grab part of Syria and start a war in the neighborhood. 

David also talks with trend forecaster Gerald Celente about the sorry state of the world economy and the suspicious rash of banker deaths. 

Anthony Gucciardi will be in-studio to talk about missing nuclear weapons.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually

 to listen to a spectrum of voices in order to better 
 understand the "big picture." A reliance solely upon
 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
 
 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents. 

 Think for yourself!
